wikipedia_page.main: John Fayram, a portrait and landscape painter, practised in London. He died in 1744.

response: Beside the Zoffany painting there is also a much younger and larger portrait by John Fayram in the Ickworth Rotunda .The Honourable Felton Hervey (1712–1775), Your Paintings, BBC. Retrieved 3 June 2014 and the National Trust own a miniature of him by Christian Friedrich Zincke, which dates from about 1730.Felton Hervey miniature, National Trust. Retrieved 7 June 2014
